welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Boom, Belgium! Nestled along the beautiful Antwerpse Rupel river, our charming city is known for its rich history and vibrant music festivals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Boom has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Brussels Airport, dedicated to long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
